file_content.text: Gotta keep an eye on the Imps at all times. They're shifty.
I took care of those droids. They were planting explosives on the roof.
I knew it! Didn't I tell you they were up to no good? Imps were going to blow the factory sky-high!
Appreciate you taking care of this. Kind of makes the sacrifice my boys made seem like it mattered, you know?
Those droids are up to no good. Feel it in my bones.
Hey! How'd you get here? Who are you?
Oh. A Jedi. Sorry. You startled me.
Oh. You're one of our soldiers. Sorry. Didn't recognize you.
Wait. You're with the Republic, right? Sure. You're one of them freelancers that's been helping us out.
Wait. You're with the Republic, right? Yeah. You've been helping us out.
Lieutenant Meric. You can't be sneaking up on me like that. Nearly gave me a heart attack.
I just walked over here in a normal way.
I wasn't sneaking.
Normal? Ha! Nobody's normal here. The air's a little funny, you know? But that's not why I'm nervous.
Relax.
Tell that to the team I sent out. Oh, wait--you can't. Because they never came back!
What's the situation?
Been watching those buildings in the distance. Republic factories. Imperial droids attacked them. Now they're up on the roof.
They're up to something. Can't be good. Sent my boys to investigate. They didn't make it.
I'll deal with this.
You got this? Seriously? Great. Good.
A lot of good men and women have given their lives in the fight against the Empire.
I'm sorry for your loss.
Got that right. But I ain't ready to give up. I'm guessing neither are you.
Go to the factory roof and figure out what those droids are up to. Maybe stop 'em while you're at it?
Come back here and fill me in when you're done so I can file a report with HQ.
I'm busy. [Refuse quest]
Sure. Whatever. Go. I'll figure something out. Didn't want your help anyway.
Oh! What? Don't sneak up on me like that! Can't you see I'm busy?
